law.text: All insurers issuing group or blanket health insurance policies and certificates in this Commonwealth that provide coverage on an expense-incurred basis for surgical services for a mastectomy and that are delivered, issued for delivery, amended, or renewed on or after October 15, 1990, shall also provide coverage for mammograms under KRS 304.17-316. The coverage shall meet the standards set forth in KRS 304.17-316.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
